title: When wearing earbuds, wired & bluetooth, I only hear in the right ear. Tried with 6 different sets
content: Whenever I try earbuds, with wireless and wired, I can only hear in the right ear. If I'm on a phone or video call, both ears work. I've tried with at least 6 different sets of headphones that all work fine on other devices and non of them work with my pixel 5.
